review_text_positive: "Discover the pinnacle of modern luxury at Kostanay's finest hotel. This exceptional destination stands out not just for its contemporary elegance, but also for its exclusive in-house brewery and artisanal cheese production. Perfect for remote work, the hotel offers a serene ambiance complemented by well-appointed workspaces. Indulge in the convenience of ordering delectable cuisine directly from the acclaimed restaurant below. Experience a harmonious blend of comfort, gastronomy, and productivity at this unparalleled retreat."
review_text_negative: "Reflecting on my previous stay a few years ago, I fondly remember the personalized breakfast experience, where meals were thoughtfully served a la carte. This added a touch of elegance and exclusivity to the mornings. However, during my recent visit, I noticed a shift to a buffet-style breakfast. While convenient, this change has, in my opinion, somewhat lessened the charm and variety of the morning meal, missing the delightful personal touch of being served by a waiter."

review_text_positive: "In general the level of this hotel for Karaganda is really great. It has super nice and comfortable rooms, 24/7 restaurant downstairs and another one on the second floor open till 02:00 and I always stay here when coming to the city. Breakfast is a la carte and nice. But this time the drawback was really serious for me, thus I can't rate it higher."
review_text_negative: "The a/c! It was hot in the room. When I turned to the reception with the question, how to switch is to "cold", I was told that it's impossible, cause many guests are claiming that it's cold int he rooms... I still haven't understood the link between one and another. Are all the A/Cs connected somehow? Why they are not individual? Why I cannot make the comfortable temperature in my separate room and have to depend on the "rest of the guests"... That sounds like a crap... And - yes, that spoiled the impression, cause after all the night sleep is the most important part of any hotel facility."

review_text_positive: "Many food choices on breakfast, bar in the hotel with cold beer. ZUMA restaurant. Solyanka Soup. Room was quite different than room I got later (different reservation) - price similar. For business stay is quite good."
review_text_negative: "I have arrived earlier, my reservation was bit later and nobody cares it. waited two hours for regular hours check-in. I have informed them that next day I have another booking reservation and requested if we can do it fast (had to change to another room). Next day nobody cares and I have to wait another two hours with suitcase in my hand. I really don't understand it. If I continue in same hotel somebody should think about it and check you earlier or offer you some solution. to not waste your time."

review_text_positive: "I stayed at AHMAD HOTEL for a few days and had a very positive experience with the place. First of all, the location of the hotel was perfect for my trip. It was located in the city center, making it close to major attractions, restaurants and shopping. The interior of the hotel also left a deep impression on me. The hotel was furnished with excellent taste and the cozy atmosphere created a feeling of comfort and relaxation. The staff at AHMAD HOTEL were exceptionally friendly and helpful. They were always ready to help with any of my requests and questions. Special thanks for their professionalism and hospitality. The room I stayed in was clean and comfortable. I appreciated the comfortable bed and well-equipped bathroom. It is also worth noting that the breakfasts provided at the hotel were varied and delicious. I always started my day with a good meal. In addition, the cost of staying at the hotel was very reasonable considering the level of service and quality of services provided. I was very pleased with my stay at AHMAD HOTEL and will definitely consider it as my first choice when next visiting the city. I recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and welcoming place to stay."
review_text_negative: "However, one of the small drawbacks of the AHMAD HOTEL that is worth mentioning is that there is no possibility to order dinner in the evening. However, in compensation for this, they always hospitably treat guests with a variety of tasty treats and tea. It's a nice gesture, but for those who prefer to dine at the hotel, it may be a bit of an inconvenience. Otherwise, my stay here was pleasant and comfortable and I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a cozy and welcoming place to stay."

review_text_positive: "Good location"
review_text_negative: "The hotel is a "tired" junior suite, but in essence it is a hostel.The sockets in the room are all hanging on a cable or are missing, the bathtub does not close, the room is double and there is only one hanger, there are no tea accessories, no glasses. Breakfast is brought to the room, but it is cold; the only hot thing is water in the kettle."

review_text_positive: "The only plus was the comfortable temperature in the room."

review_text_positive: "The staff was friendly and helpful, the location is on the right bank, with a church under the windows."
review_text_negative: "The quality of the room is terrible, the panel above the bed was torn and cut, as if after a fight or a wild night, the mattress was dirty and clearly no one had dry-cleaned it for many years, the glass in the window was cracked, not airtight, it was cold at night and there was a draft from this window, the administrator suggested putting a blanket on the window, this is of course nonsense for a hotel level, but the best option so as not to freeze at night, since I was with a baby. The towels were a washed-out gray color, with stains, I was disgusted even to touch them, the linen was washed-out, dirty gray. There was no kettle, no glass, no tea set, no spoon in the room, I had to ask the administrator for everything, considering that the rooms are cold, it was possible to provide a kettle and tea as a bonus, but this was not the case. I turned on the TV, but the switching buttons did not work, it says watch only one channel. The rooms are apparently not cleaned very well, as the floor was dirty and there was dust and crumbs behind the nightstand. Considering that we arrived late at night, and with a child, I had no choice but to look for another option at night. The price and quality are completely inconsistent."

To turn on the kettle and the fridge you have to, excuse me, get down on all fours and crawl under the table - there are sockets there. You are positioning yourself as a VIP hotel, think about it."

review_text_negative: "The room was one of the worst in terms of price/quality ratio. The bathroom door wouldn't close, the exhaust fan didn't work, and there was no minibar."

review_text_positive: "Outstanding service by reception staff. From helping me charge my phone with a power bank to helping me recover it, they went out of their way to provide exceptional guest service, way more than expected. The Italian restaurant in house was very good with excellent service."

review_text_positive: "Close to restaurants"
review_text_negative: "Strange layout inside the room. Water sink is in the main area of the room and VERY small. Towels are in another corner of the room! Very far from the sink and from the shower. No hooks to hang towels!"

review_text_positive: "Loved the design of the place, how conveniently it is located, beautiful view from the room, spacious room, comfy bed, great products in the bathroom, delicious breakfast."
review_text_negative: "The only aspect that put me off was the lack of assistance at the lobby entrance/exit. At a five-star hotel, I would expect that level of service both at the start and the end of my stay."

review_text_positive: "Clean good interior"

review_text_positive: "Good breakfasts and restaurants"

review_text_negative: "Beds are very soft and extremely uncomfortable, after 3 days I had backache  They told me "temporarily hot water will not be available" in the end it was not available for 4 days. "

review_text_positive: "The architecture of this luxury boutique hotel is striking, with an imaginative design and unconventional elements. The hotel features three restaurants, two of which I have tried and was quite happy with, and there is a nice spa on the third floor‚Äîwith three different kinds of sauna. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel's location generally requires a taxi or other motorized transport, except for those who enjoy hiking."
review_text_negative: "First, the breakfast falls well below expectations, not even reaching a three-star standard, and is wholly inadequate for a five-star hotel. Power outlets were scarce and impractically placed; for instance, the outlet on the right side of the bed was incompatible with a standard Apple adapter."

review_text_positive: "Safe parking for motorcycles and cars. Two supermarkets within 50 metres."
review_text_negative: "WiFi does not work in rooms at the end of both corridors."

review_text_negative: "The WiFi was very weak, sometimes it just wasn't there at all. The walls were very thin, and the sound was quite loud."

review_text_positive: "We stayed for 5 nights. The staff was very polite and the room was cozy and clean. The bathroom included a disposable toothbrush, shower gel, and shampoo. Two convenience stores were conveniently located nearby."
review_text_negative: "In the mornings the restaurant smelled strongly of boiled bones."

review_text_positive: "The location is super"

review_text_positive: "clean, cozy"
review_text_negative: "On the third day, the toilet stopped flushing completely; there was no pressure. The air conditioner wasn't blowing cold air, making the room damp and hot, even though the outside temperature was 30 degrees."

review_text_positive: "The living conditions are all good."
review_text_negative: "For that price, you could have a proper breakfast, not just scrambled eggs with the cheapest sausage and oatmeal. And a couple of sticks of instant coffee in your room, not just tea."

review_text_positive: "Great location, wonderful staff, there were some difficulties, the guys always resolved them quickly!!"

review_text_positive: "The hotel was pristine and comfortable. The staff were very helpful with any inquiries I had regarding the city of Astana. And the addition of the minibar is nice to have. Good WiFi, too."

review_text_positive: "Decent location, not far from major attractions, a mall with Starbucks a few blocks away.  Really loved the interior design! Helpful staff"

review_text_positive: "The beds were comfortable, the pillows were soft as well. Hotel‚Äôs location makes it suitable for travelers who need to wake up early for their flights."
review_text_negative: "The beds were comfortable, the pillows were soft as well. Hotel‚Äôs location makes it suitable for travelers who need to wake up early for their flights."

review_text_positive: "We wanted something close to the airport and Port Inn was IN the airport. Couldn't have been a better location. Completely quiet. Priced right. Room had a very well-stocked refrigerator and a wide assortment of snack and food."
review_text_negative: "High sill on entry door and steps up into hotel made it difficult to get our luggage into hallway."

review_text_negative: "Can be a bit noisy"

review_text_positive: "Location right next to the terminal was great."
review_text_negative: "Could have included free water bottles in the room."

review_text_positive: "The hotel is actually in the terminal of the Astana Nursultan Nazarbayev airport which is great location for people on a stopover. Some rooms have a view to the airfield which is great news for avgeeks. The room was very large, furniture basic, but ergonomic. Perfect place for a one night stay between flights. Check in straightforward and fast. Vast selection of snacks and drinks in room minibar. I would definitely return to the hotel if I ever need a transfer in Astana again."
review_text_negative: "The hotel does not offer breakfast. There is no kettle in the room. Access to the lobby via a few stairs, no elevator, only lift for people with disabilities activated when necessary."

review_text_positive: "It's on the airport grounds, and there's an excellent cafe at the departure level at the Astana airport."

review_text_positive: "Clean, very good repair."

review_text_positive: "I like the hotel very much. It was just what I wanted and the staff were excellent - a real credit to the hotel."
